description: Detects programs with network connections running in suspicious files system locations
name: Suspicious Program Location with Network Connections
query: ((process.executable:(*\\Users\\All\ Users\\* OR *\\Users\\Default\\* OR *\\Users\\Public\\* OR *\\Users\\Contacts\\* OR *\\Users\\Searches\\* OR *\\config\\systemprofile\\* OR *\\Windows\\Fonts\\* OR *\\Windows\\IME\\* OR *\\Windows\\addins\\*) OR process.executable:*\\$Recycle.bin OR process.executable:C\:\\Perflogs\\*) AND (NOT ((process.executable:C\:\\Users\\Public\\IBM\\ClientSolutions\\Start_Programs\\*))))
author: Florian Roth
Tim Shelton
